video.title: Sonic X Shadow Generations | Fully Ramblomatic

captions.text: [Music]
[Applause]
well I&#39;ve already pissed off the
Nintendo fans and the Call of Duty fans
in the last two weeks let&#39;s go for the
hattick and do Sonic the Hedgehog as
well let&#39;s see if I can encourage the
driveby Fanboys to break my last two
front windows Sonic X Shadow generations
is a game highlighting both Sonic the
Hedgehog a G1 Woodland creature with
Angry Eyes and to Shadow the Hedgehog
slightly edgy a teen Woodland creature
with even angrier eyes the Sega came up
with after original Sonic&#39;s edginess
wasn&#39;t quite hitting anymore and
American High School kids weren&#39;t being
sent home enough for wearing his
t-shirts so Shadow is like Sonic but
he&#39;s dark and broody with the black and
red color scheme and Carries a Gun and
wears rollerblades the darkest and most
broodiest of the traversal Footwear
because it&#39;s got the word blade in it
and it&#39;s all about as laughable as it
sounds even more so now Sonic Team
apparently feel they need to make a
gushing tribute to the depth and
creativity of this character that
literally any Sonic fan could have come
up with by themselves given some black
and red markers the back of a homework
diary and a few awkward high school
years I will of course be focusing on
the Shadow generations half of the
experience offered the rest is just a
remaster of Sonic Generations and I said
all I needed to say in my original
review of that back in get the [ __ ] out
of town 2012 man I always think of Sonic
Generations as a recent Sonic game I
mean logically a shamelessly nostalgic
retra of a series would be something you
do towards the end when you&#39;re about
ready to move to hospice care no look at
that wik don&#39;t lie Sonic Lost World
sonic boom sonic forces all came out
after Generations did maybe I got
confused cuz I assume Sonic probably
[ __ ] wishes he&#39;d gone into Hospice
Care before those three came out out
anyway as I say it&#39;s the new game Shadow
generations I&#39;m looking at which has
been bolted onto the side of this
remaster in much the same way Bowser
Fury was bolted onto the re-release of
Super Mario 3D World and what fired my
interest in reviewing this game was when
I heard Shadow generations takes an
interesting open world approach to the
gameplay established in the Bas game
much like Bowser Fury did thinking about
it hang on the title screen way you
select the game is formatted exactly
like how Bowser Fury did it Sonic do you
still think Mario is your main rival
that is so [ __ ] adorable Mario hasn&#39;t
thought about you in [ __ ] decades not
since the last time you were at the
Olympics together and all that he
thought was Mama Mia did somebody clean
up a load of blue paint turn the mop
upside down and glue Angry Eyes to it
anyway much like Sonic Generations
Shadow generations is a highlight re of
Shadow&#39;s previous appearances and as
could be expected the result is a much
shorter game cuz he&#39;s only playable in
like three but we do our best to pay off
what plot was established in those which
was helpfully summarized for me in a
video on the title menu apparently
Shadow was created to be the perfect
life form if it were me I&#39;d designed the
perfect life form to be tall enough to
ride the roller coasters by one Dr
Robotnik not the same Robotnik as the
established one presumably a cousin or a
contemporary or at least someone who
goes to the same mustache Barber and
there was me thinking this was going to
get needlessly confusing the doctor had
a dyed young daughter with whom Shadow
had a slightly suspect relationship and
I guess it was her dying that sent him
down the path of being dark and broody
and listening to Lincoln Park which is
what makes it funny when temporal
[ __ ] causes her to show up in Shadow
generations and Shadow acts like an
embarrassed teenager when his parents
come to pick him up from the school
disco also Shadow&#39;s got the DNA of an
evil alien who you can tell is evil cuz
they&#39;re purple the established evil
color and their goal was to attt a
shadow over to the side of painting
himself purple and that whole dynamic
plays out basically the same as it did
before along what passes for Shadow
generations is plot you start out in the
Sonic Generations trademark white void
actually I don&#39;t think you can trademark
a wi void but if you can the [ __ ]
printer paper people will have you set
for life and through completing standard
3D Sonic style levels The Hub World
gradually manifests until you&#39;ve got a
veritable Disneyland of terrain and
platform challenges only one of the
piddly little Disneylands mine cuz
there&#39;s only four levels for the Hub
world to connect so to pad things out
you have to do both act to the level and
then go back to do some extra challenges
like collect x amount of Rings or sing
along faultlessly to the Black Parade
for 1 minute before it lets you into the
boss fight but if you&#39;re into 3D Sonic
gameplay it&#39;s all more excuses to do it
I suppose I&#39;m not for the record 3D
Sonic levels are like going down a
partially completed water slide with a
custom device mounted to your head
incorporating a set of blinkers and a
boxing glove on a spring aimed at your
face I always hate the way it obliges
you to collect hidden tokens when it
refuses to let you backtrack or move the
camera or do anything that might
interrupt the ongoing white noise of
spectacular high-speed stunts that you
are only allegedly in control of like a
recent graduate student with their life
the levels and Shadow Generation still
have your hunt tokens but only three
level and they&#39;re only for spending on
boxes in the hub world that unlock
concept art and music tracks and the
moment I realized that I went oh thank
[ __ ] Christ I don&#39;t give a [ __ ] about
any of that now I can Breeze through the
levels not worrying about collecting any
stupid tokens feel the wind in my hair
and the Crickets in my teeth which I of
course appreciate because I&#39;m a hedgehog
and therefore insectivorous nom nom nom
nom nom as I say the open world Hub
expands the more levels you complete but
the effect of that is by the time the
whole thing&#39;s unlocked there isn&#39;t much
left to do the Hub just isn&#39;t big enough
to give you that Sonic Frontier sense of
cathartic Freedom by the end your
traversal PO is about to run on water
run on different kind of water and glide
like a board summer camp attendee on a
zipline I tried getting into the open
world Spirit but I felt like I was
pissing around in a skate park by myself
cuz all my friends were in remedial
school so my summary is a resounding
lack of
consonant you know part of the evidence
I have for Sonic Team not knowing what
the [ __ ] they&#39;re doing is that they
never recognize Shadow as the profoundly
easy target for mockery that he is with
his [ __ ] helies and his [ __ ]
Batman voice no it&#39;s all straight faces
and tragic Back stories when he&#39;s around
isn&#39;t it no good natured ribbing from
the less uptight characters asking to
borrow his cure albums why can&#39;t you be
more like Sonic he&#39;s upbeat with his
smiles and his jokes and his onliners
dear God what am I saying all forgiven
Shadow pass the shoe polish
[Music]
[Music]
[Applause]
w
[Applause]
